#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<map>
#include<math.h>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>
#include<iomanip>
#include<algorithm>
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);i<=(b);++i)
#define NFOR(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);i>=(b);--i)
#define pb push_back
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
ll maze[101][101];
ll visited[101][101];
ll cc=0;
ll n;
void route(ll i,ll j)
{
    if(i==n-1&&j==n-1)
    {
        cc++;
        return;
    }
    visited[i][j]=1;
    if((j+1<n)&&(!maze[i][j+1])&&(!visited[i][j+1]))
     route(i,j+1);
    if(j-1>=0&&!maze[i][j-1]&&!visited[i][j-1])
     route(i,j-1);
    if(i+1<n&&!maze[i+1][j]&&!visited[i+1][j])
     route(i+1,j);
    if(i-1>=0&&!maze[i-1][j]&&!visited[i-1][j])
     route(i-1,j);
     visited[i][j]=0;
    return;
}
int main()
{
    cin>>n;
    FOR(i,0,n-1)
    {
        FOR(j,0,n-1)
        {
            cin>>maze[i][j];
            visited[i][j]=0;
        }
    }
    route(0,0);
    cout<<cc<<endl;
}
